channel.title: Metadata on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Metadata on SoftLayer API

item.title: Set a server's metadata
item.description: import SoftLayer from pprint import pprint as pp # CHANGE ME server = 678243 client = SoftLayer.Client() mask = "mask[attributes]" # Sets the metadata for this server to tttttt result1 = client['SoftLayer_Hardware_Server'].setUserMetadata({'value': 'tttttt'},id=server) pp(result1) result2 = client['SoftLayer_Hardware_Server'].getObject(mask=mask,id=server) pp(result2)
